content.raw: Argparse will return an object containing values for all the options which apply to that task, setting them to none if there is nothing specified in the cmdline. The issue here is that observations does not apply to identify and so when we run segway identify at this point the options.observation object will not exist since that wasn’t a valid option for this task.
content.html: Argparse will return an object containing values for all the options which apply to that task, setting them to none if there is nothing specified in the cmdline. The issue here is that observations does not apply to identify and so when we run segway identify at this point the options.observation object will not exist since that wasn’t a valid option for this task.
